name: The European Game Series
overview:
European Game Series BV ( EGS) is founded by Mike Slagmolen and Bert Du Toy van Hees. This unique combination of personalities consisting of a remarkable long term gaming and business combination is a guarantee for success.

We are partially funded by the local government through a minority share.

The EGS is a further development of DGC which mainly focussed on live gaming events.

We will be dramatically expanding our service portfolio in order to offer the best consumer and business to business game experience possible.

We aim to carry out the highest possible service level and quality of our products, with the lowest barrier possible for our customers. This means focus on triple AAA locations, Full-HD broadcasting, Multiple advertising options, highly engaged target-base, against low costs on top of that we own some of the best internet-platforms on the globe.
